content: *** updates as of 3/18/25 * written decrease pattern has been updated and tested - see additional photos to reflect accuracy * alternative color pattern hat with white accent color and purple main color as an example provided in photo * alternate brim option with 2 inch brim for non-folding provided in purple/white hat photo this size hat of 96 stitches is a medium and fits a 22 circumference for smaller size decrease stitches by 12 84 or increase by 12 108 for large size **please message me directly with any questions ** - yarn selection is knitters choice - two colors of their choosing both colors require less than a skein the hat in this pattern uses caron simply soft in grey as the main color and dark country blue for the accent color
